A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I would rate this movie higher if it weren’t for the fact that it was so disappointing and was part of such a beloved franchise. Props to cinematography\, score\, acting and some nice nods to the OT\, but the sloppy writing\, plot holes\, out-of-character moments\, the fact that some of the plot was entirely irrelevant and that there were NO FUCKING LIGHTSABER DUELS made me leave the theater with a bitter taste in my mouth. Was it watchable? Sure. Do I think it stacks up to the OT? Hell nah.
